Package com.diabetesmanagment.diabetesmanagment.service.impl

Class PatientServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.diabetesmanagment.diabetesmanagment.service.impl.PatientServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PatientService
@Service public class PatientServiceImpl extends Object implements PatientService
Implementation of the PatientService interface providing methods to interact with patient data.
